entry.title: Monday: Periods of snow. Temperature falling to minus 7 this afternoon.
entry.summary: Periods of snow ending near noon then a mix of sun and cloud. Amount 2 to 4 cm. Wind south 20 km/h becoming west 20 gusting to 40 near noon. Temperature falling to minus 7 this afternoon. Wind chill near minus 12. Forecast issued 05:00 AM PST Monday 06 February 2023
